Minnesota's Premier Venue

Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance

Create unforgettable memories in our beautifully restored barn, surrounded by 400 acres of Minnesota's natural splendor. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, your vision becomes reality here.

<section class="alternating-blocks section-shape-top shape--subtle-wave">
<div class="container">
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">01</div>
<h3>The Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>
<li>Capacity for up to 300 guests</li>
<li>State-of-the-art lighting system</li>
</ul>

</div>

</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item reverse">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">02</div>
<h3>Vineyard Ceremonies</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Sunset ceremony perfection</li>
<li>Natural amphitheater setting</li>
<li>Rain backup in covered pavilion</li>
<li>Complimentary wine tasting for couples</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">View Ceremony Sites</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Vineyard ceremony site" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1474112704314-8162b7749a90?w=800"/>

</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">03</div>
<h3>Enchanted Forest</h3>
<p>Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Professional trail lighting available</li>
<li>Hidden clearings for portraits</li>
<li>Seasonal wildflower meadows</li>
<li>Private couple's photography hour</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Discover The Grounds</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Forest wedding photos" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519741497674-611481863552?w=800"/>

LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Every corner tells a story, every space creates memories

The Historic Barn

Our crown jewel, this beautifully restored barn features soaring ceilings, original timber beams, and modern amenities seamlessly integrated into its historic charm.

Up to 300 guests

LIVE PREVIEW

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

LIVE PREVIEW
Minnesota's Premier Venue

Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance

Create unforgettable memories in our beautifully restored barn, surrounded by 400 acres of Minnesota's natural splendor. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, your vision becomes reality here.

View Gallery Check Availability

2025 Dates

Limited availability for peak season

HTML CODE 
<section class="alternating-blocks section-shape-top shape--subtle-wave">
<div class="container">
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">01</div>
<h3>The Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>
<li>Capacity for up to 300 guests</li>
<li>State-of-the-art lighting system</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Explore The Barn</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Historic barn interior" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1510076857177-7470076d4098?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">100+ Years</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item reverse">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">02</div>
<h3>Vineyard Ceremonies</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Sunset ceremony perfection</li>
<li>Natural amphitheater setting</li>
<li>Rain backup in covered pavilion</li>
<li>Complimentary wine tasting for couples</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">View Ceremony Sites</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Vineyard ceremony site" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1474112704314-8162b7749a90?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">5 Locations</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">03</div>
<h3>Enchanted Forest</h3>
<p>Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Professional trail lighting available</li>
<li>Hidden clearings for portraits</li>
<li>Seasonal wildflower meadows</li>
<li>Private couple's photography hour</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Discover The Grounds</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Forest wedding photos" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519741497674-611481863552?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">400 Acres</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>

LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Explore Our Spaces

Every corner tells a story, every space creates memories

The Historic Barn

Our crown jewel, this beautifully restored barn features soaring ceilings, original timber beams, and modern amenities seamlessly integrated into its historic charm.

Capacity

Up to 300 guests

Features

Built-in bar & dance floor

Lighting

Edison bulbs & chandeliers

Climate

Heated & air conditioned

LIVE PREVIEW

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

SERVICE SECTIONS asdfdasfrum-river-wedding-venue.html 1354 bytes
grid cards medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="features" id="features">
<h2>Exceptional <span class="accent-text">Amenities</span></h2>
<div class="features-grid">
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🏛️</div>
<h3>Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Our beautifully restored 1890s barn accommodates up to 250 guests with original timber beams and modern amenities.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🍇</div>
<h3>Vineyard Views</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling vineyards and enjoy locally produced wines from our own harvest.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🌅</div>
<h3>Outdoor Ceremony</h3>
<p>Multiple outdoor ceremony locations including our garden pavilion and riverside grove.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">👰</div>
<h3>Bridal Suite</h3>
<p>Spacious bridal suite with private entrance, full amenities, and stunning views for preparation.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🍽️</div>
<h3>Catering Excellence</h3>
<p>Full-service kitchen and partnerships with the region's finest caterers and culinary artists.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">📸</div>
<h3>Photo Opportunities</h3>
<p>Countless scenic backdrops including vintage bridges, wildflower meadows, and golden hour vineyard rows.</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Exceptional Amenities

🏛️

Historic Barn

Our beautifully restored 1890s barn accommodates up to 250 guests with original timber beams and modern amenities.

🍇

Vineyard Views

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling vineyards and enjoy locally produced wines from our own harvest.

🌅

Outdoor Ceremony

Multiple outdoor ceremony locations including our garden pavilion and riverside grove.

👰

Bridal Suite

Spacious bridal suite with private entrance, full amenities, and stunning views for preparation.

🍽️

Catering Excellence

Full-service kitchen and partnerships with the region's finest caterers and culinary artists.

📸

Photo Opportunities

Countless scenic backdrops including vintage bridges, wildflower meadows, and golden hour vineyard rows.

About (Content Sections) - Grid Layout [Asdfdasfrum River We]

YourPerfect DayAwaitsNestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restore

CONTENT SECTIONS asdfdasfrum-river-wedding-venue.html 703 bytes
grid medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="about" id="about">
<div class="section-container">
<div class="about-grid">
<div class="about-content">
<h2>Your <span class="accent-text">Perfect Day</span><br/>Awaits</h2>
<p>Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.</p>
<p>With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.</p>
<p>Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.</p>
</div>
<div class="about-image">
<div class="image-placeholder"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Your Perfect Day
Awaits

Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.

With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.

Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.

Exceptional Amenities

🏛️

Historic Barn

Our beautifully restored 1890s barn accommodates up to 250 guests with original timber beams and modern amenities.

🍇

Vineyard Views

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling vineyards and enjoy locally produced wines from our own harvest.

Multiple outdoor ceremony locations including our garden pavilion and riverside grove.

👰

Spacious bridal suite with private entrance, full amenities, and stunning views for preparation.

🍽️

Full-service kitchen and partnerships with the region's finest caterers and culinary artists.

📸

            at Rum River Barn & Vineyard
        </p>
<a class="contact-button" href="#">SCHEDULE A TOUR</a>
<a class="contact-button" href="#">REQUEST PRICING</a>
<p style="margin-top: 40px; opacity: 0.8;">
            📍 123 River Valley Road, Countryside, MN 55555<br/>
            📞 (555) 123-4567 | ✉️ weddings@rumriverbarn.com
        </p>
</section>

at Rum River Barn & Vineyard

About (Content Sections) - Grid Layout [Asdfrum River Weddin]

YourPerfect DayAwaitsNestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restore

CONTENT SECTIONS asdfrum-river-wedding-venue.html 703 bytes
grid medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="about" id="about">
<div class="section-container">
<div class="about-grid">
<div class="about-content">
<h2>Your <span class="accent-text">Perfect Day</span><br/>Awaits</h2>
<p>Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.</p>
<p>With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.</p>
<p>Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.</p>
</div>
<div class="about-image">
<div class="image-placeholder"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Your Perfect Day
Awaits

Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.

With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.

Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.

<p class="script-font">Your Dream Venue Awaits</p>
<h2>A Picturesque Setting for Your Perfect Day</h2>
<p>When it comes to life's most precious moments—weddings, milestone celebrations, and cherished gatherings—the setting matters. At Rum River Barn & Vineyard, we don't just provide a venue; we offer a canvas for your dreams.</p>
<p>Unlike traditional venues, we believe in saying "yes" to your vision. Your celebration, your way—with our full support to bring every detail to life.</p>

LIVE PREVIEW

Your Dream Venue Awaits

A Picturesque Setting for Your Perfect Day

When it comes to life's most precious moments—weddings, milestone celebrations, and cherished gatherings—the setting matters. At Rum River Barn & Vineyard, we don't just provide a venue; we offer a canvas for your dreams.

Unlike traditional venues, we believe in saying "yes" to your vision. Your celebration, your way—with our full support to bring every detail to life.

NEAR MILACA SAINT PAUL ST. CLOUD BRAINERD

📞 Reserve Your Date: 612-801-0546

Book Early

Our calendar fills quickly—secure your perfect date today!

</div>

LIVE PREVIEW

Why Choose Us

400 Acres of Pure Country Magic

🍇

Vineyard Views

Exchange vows overlooking our stunning grape vineyards, where rolling hills meet Minnesota's natural beauty.

🌳

Century-Old Oaks

Mile-long paths through manicured oak forests and white pines create an enchanted backdrop for photos.

🏚️

Historic Barn

Our restored barn combines 100 years of history with modern amenities for the perfect rustic elegance.

💧

Whispering Brook

A peaceful stream winds through the property, offering serene ceremony spots and romantic photo opportunities.

✨

Your Vision, Our Yes

We believe in making dreams reality—bring your wildest ideas and watch us help them come to life.

🌄

Hillside Serenity

Perched on a peaceful hillside, enjoy panoramic views and the tranquil atmosphere of rural Minnesota.

LIVE PREVIEW

Your Journey

From First Visit to "I Do"

We're with you every step of the way, ensuring your special day unfolds perfectly.

1

Schedule Your Tour

Walk our grounds, explore the barn, and envision your celebration in our scenic spaces.

2

Design Your Day

Work with our team to customize every detail—from ceremony location to reception layout.

3

Vendor Freedom

Choose your own caterers, florists, and musicians—or select from our preferred partners.

4

Celebrate in Style

Relax and enjoy as your vision comes to life in Minnesota's premier barn venue.

<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">01</div>
<h3>The Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>
<li>Capacity for up to 300 guests</li>
<li>State-of-the-art lighting system</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item reverse">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">02</div>
<h3>Vineyard Ceremonies</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Sunset ceremony perfection</li>
<li>Natural amphitheater setting</li>
<li>Rain backup in covered pavilion</li>
<li>Complimentary wine tasting for couples</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">View Ceremony Sites</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Vineyard ceremony site" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1474112704314-8162b7749a90?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">5 Locations</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">03</div>
<h3>Enchanted Forest</h3>
<p>Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Professional trail lighting available</li>
<li>Hidden clearings for portraits</li>
<li>Seasonal wildflower meadows</li>
<li>Private couple's photography hour</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Discover The Grounds</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">

<span class="image-badge">400 Acres</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>

LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

<a class="cta-button" href="#contact">Learn More</a>
</div>
<div class="package-card">
<h3>Grand Estate</h3>
<p class="package-price">$22,000</p>
<p>The ultimate luxury experience</p>
<ul class="package-features">
<li>Up to 300 guests</li>
<li>Full weekend access</li>
<li>All venue spaces & grounds</li>

Venue (Content Sections) - Tabs

A Venue Like No OtherWelcome to The Meadowlark Barn, where the romance of yesteryear meets modern el

CONTENT SECTIONS barn-venue-website.html 853 bytes
medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="about-section" id="venue">
<div class="about-container">
<div class="about-image"></div>
<div class="about-content">
<h2>A Venue Like No Other</h2>
<p>Welcome to The Meadowlark Barn, where the romance of yesteryear meets modern elegance. Our meticulously restored 1890s barn offers the perfect backdrop for your special day, combining rustic charm with contemporary amenities.</p>
<p>Situated on 40 acres of pristine countryside, our venue provides endless opportunities for stunning photography, intimate ceremonies, and unforgettable receptions. From the hand-hewn beams to the original stone foundation, every detail tells a story of heritage and craftsmanship.</p>
<p>Our dedicated team ensures that your celebration is not just an event, but an experience that you and your guests will treasure forever.</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

A Venue Like No Other

Welcome to The Meadowlark Barn, where the romance of yesteryear meets modern elegance. Our meticulously restored 1890s barn offers the perfect backdrop for your special day, combining rustic charm with contemporary amenities.

Situated on 40 acres of pristine countryside, our venue provides endless opportunities for stunning photography, intimate ceremonies, and unforgettable receptions. From the hand-hewn beams to the original stone foundation, every detail tells a story of heritage and craftsmanship.

Our dedicated team ensures that your celebration is not just an event, but an experience that you and your guests will treasure forever.

Spaces (Content Sections) - Grid Layout, Tabs [Barn Venue Website]

Our Stunning SpacesThree unique settings for your perfect celebrationThe Grand BarnOur main receptio

CONTENT SECTIONS barn-venue-website.html 1426 bytes
grid cards medium light-theme
HTML CODE 
<section class="venue-spaces" id="spaces">
<div class="section-header">
<h2>Our Stunning Spaces</h2>
<p>Three unique settings for your perfect celebration</p>
</div>
<div class="spaces-grid">
<div class="space-card">
<div class="space-image" data-space="The Grand Barn"></div>
<div class="space-content">
<h3>The Grand Barn</h3>
<p>Our main reception space features soaring ceilings, exposed beams, and romantic string lighting. Perfect for dinner and dancing under the stars visible through our restored cupola.</p>
<div class="capacity">
<span>👥</span>
<span>Seats up to 300 guests</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="space-card">
<div class="space-image" data-space="The Garden Pavilion"></div>
<div class="space-content">
<h3>The Garden Pavilion</h3>
<p>An enchanting outdoor ceremony space surrounded by manicured gardens and mature trees. Features a stunning arbor and comfortable seating for your guests.</p>
<div class="capacity">
<span>👥</span>
<span>Seats up to 250 guests</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="space-card">
<div class="space-image" data-space="The Loft Lounge"></div>
<div class="space-content">
<h3>The Loft Lounge</h3>
<p>An intimate space perfect for cocktail hours, small gatherings, or as a quiet retreat. Features vintage furnishings and panoramic views of the property.</p>
<div class="capacity">
<span>👥</span>
<span>Accommodates 75 guests</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Our Stunning Spaces

Three unique settings for your perfect celebration

The Grand Barn

Our main reception space features soaring ceilings, exposed beams, and romantic string lighting. Perfect for dinner and dancing under the stars visible through our restored cupola.

👥 Seats up to 300 guests

The Garden Pavilion

An enchanting outdoor ceremony space surrounded by manicured gardens and mature trees. Features a stunning arbor and comfortable seating for your guests.

👥 Seats up to 250 guests

The Loft Lounge

An intimate space perfect for cocktail hours, small gatherings, or as a quiet retreat. Features vintage furnishings and panoramic views of the property.

👥 Accommodates 75 guests

  • hello@willowcreekbarn.com
  • 1847 Willow Creek Road
  • Meadowbrook Valley, CA

About (Content Sections) - Grid Layout, 1 Buttons [Barn Wedding Venue]

Your Dream Barn Wedding AwaitsWillow Creek Barn is a restored 1890s barn that combines rustic charm

CONTENT SECTIONS barn-wedding-venue.html 1176 bytes
buttons grid medium light-theme
HTML CODE 
<section class="section" id="about">
<div class="container">
<div class="about-grid">
<div class="about-image fade-in"></div>
<div class="about-content">
<h2>Your Dream Barn Wedding Awaits</h2>
<p>
                        Willow Creek Barn is a restored 1890s barn that combines rustic charm with modern amenities. 
                        Set on 40 acres of pristine countryside, our venue offers the perfect backdrop for your special day.
                    </p>
<p>
                        From intimate ceremonies to grand celebrations, we provide an enchanting setting where 
                        memories are made and love stories unfold against the backdrop of weathered wood, 
                        twinkling lights, and natural beauty.
                    </p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Historic barn with original architecture</li>
<li>Accommodates up to 250 guests</li>
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Stunning outdoor ceremony sites</li>
<li>Professional wedding coordination</li>
<li>Ample parking and accessibility</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn" href="#packages" style="margin-top: 2rem;">View Packages</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Your Dream Barn Wedding Awaits

Willow Creek Barn is a restored 1890s barn that combines rustic charm with modern amenities. Set on 40 acres of pristine countryside, our venue offers the perfect backdrop for your special day.

From intimate ceremonies to grand celebrations, we provide an enchanting setting where memories are made and love stories unfold against the backdrop of weathered wood, twinkling lights, and natural beauty.

  • Historic barn with original architecture
  • Accommodates up to 250 guests
  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Stunning outdoor ceremony sites
  • Professional wedding coordination
  • Ample parking and accessibility
View Packages

                        atmosphere we dreamed of."
                    </p>

                        beauty meant we needed minimal decorations, and our photos are absolutely stunning!"

                        everything was!"

Love Stories from Our Couples

"Willow Creek Barn was absolutely magical! The staff went above and beyond to make our day perfect. The rustic charm combined with elegant touches created the exact atmosphere we dreamed of."

Sarah & Michael Thompson
Married June 2024

Emily & James Martinez
Married September 2024

Jessica & David Chen
Married April 2024

<div class="content-block">
<div class="content-block-title">Our Heritage</div>
<h2>A Love Story in Every Detail</h2>
<p class="lead-text">
                        Nestled among rolling hills and ancient oak groves, Willow Creek Barn stands as a 
                        testament to enduring romance and timeless beauty.
                    </p>
<p>
                        This meticulously restored 1890s barn combines the warmth of rustic heritage with 
                        refined modern comforts, creating an enchanting backdrop for your celebration. Every 
                        weathered beam tells a story, every carefully placed detail speaks of our commitment 
                        to making your day extraordinary.
                    </p>

</div>

<h3>California's Premier Barn Venue</h3>
<p>Celebrating love since 2010</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

LIVE PREVIEW
Our Heritage

A Love Story in Every Detail

Nestled among rolling hills and ancient oak groves, Willow Creek Barn stands as a testament to enduring romance and timeless beauty.

This meticulously restored 1890s barn combines the warmth of rustic heritage with refined modern comforts, creating an enchanting backdrop for your celebration. Every weathered beam tells a story, every carefully placed detail speaks of our commitment to making your day extraordinary.

  • ✓ Original exposed beams & architectural details from 1890
  • ✓ 40 acres of pristine countryside with manicured gardens
  • ✓ Climate-controlled comfort in all seasons
  • ✓ Exclusive use of entire property on your wedding day
  • ✓ Award-winning venue with 200+ five-star reviews
Explore Our Offerings

California's Premier Barn Venue

Celebrating love since 2010

LIVE PREVIEW
What We Offer

Crafted for Your Perfect Day

Every element thoughtfully designed to create unforgettable moments

🌿

Garden Ceremony

Exchange vows beneath our century-old willow tree or in our rose garden pavilion, surrounded by nature's beauty

🏛️

The Grand Barn

Our magnificently restored barn features soaring ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and space for up to 250 guests

📸

Picture Perfect

Countless stunning backdrops including wildflower meadows, rustic doors, and our signature oak grove

🍾

Cocktail Terrace

An elegant outdoor space with string lights and garden views, perfect for sunset cocktail hours

💐

Bridal Suite

A luxurious private retreat with natural light, comfortable seating, and everything needed for preparation

✨

Full Service

Dedicated coordinators, preferred vendor list, and complete setup/breakdown so you can simply enjoy

<section class="section section-gradient-1 divider-slant-down" id="about">
<div class="container">
<div class="grid-2" style="gap: var(--spacing-xxl);">
<div class="content-block">
<span class="badge" style="display: inline-block; background: var(--accent-gold); color: white; padding: 8px 20px; border-radius: 30px; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md); font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;">Minnesota's Premier Venue</span>
<h2>Where Love Stories Begin</h2>
<p class="lead-text">
                        Create unforgettable memories in our beautifully restored barn, surrounded by 400 acres 
                        of Minnesota's natural splendor.
                    </p>
<p>
                        This meticulously preserved 1890s barn combines the warmth of rustic heritage with 
                        refined modern comforts. Every weathered beam tells a story, every carefully placed 
                        detail speaks of our commitment to making your celebration extraordinary.
                    </p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>
<span class="icon" style="background: var(--sage-green);">✓</span>
<span>Century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities</span>
</li>

<span class="icon" style="background: var(--sage-green);">✓</span>

</li>

LIVE PREVIEW
Minnesota's Premier Venue

Where Love Stories Begin

Create unforgettable memories in our beautifully restored barn, surrounded by 400 acres of Minnesota's natural splendor.

This meticulously preserved 1890s barn combines the warmth of rustic heritage with refined modern comforts. Every weathered beam tells a story, every carefully placed detail speaks of our commitment to making your celebration extraordinary.

  • ✓ Century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities
  • ✓ 400 acres of pristine Minnesota countryside
  • ✓ Climate-controlled comfort in all seasons
  • ✓ Exclusive use of entire property
  • ✓ Award-winning venue with 200+ five-star reviews
Explore Our Spaces

Minnesota's Most Sought-After Venue

Celebrating love since 2010

LIVE PREVIEW
What We Offer

Celebrate Every Moment

From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we're here for all of life's milestones

🌿

Garden Ceremonies

Exchange vows beneath our century-old willow tree or in our rose garden pavilion, surrounded by nature's beauty

🏛️

The Historic Barn

Our magnificently restored barn features soaring ceilings, Edison bulbs, and space for up to 300 guests

📸

Photography Paradise

Countless stunning backdrops including wildflower meadows, rustic doors, and our signature oak grove

🍾

Vineyard Terrace

An elegant outdoor space with string lights and vineyard views, perfect for sunset cocktail hours

💐

Bridal Suite

A luxurious private retreat with natural light, comfortable seating, and everything needed for preparation

✨

Full Service

Dedicated coordinators, preferred vendor list, and complete setup/breakdown so you can simply enjoy

LIVE PREVIEW
About Our Venue

Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance

Nestled in the heart of California's wine country, Willow Creek Barn is a meticulously restored 1890s barn that seamlessly blends historic character with contemporary luxury.

Our 40-acre estate provides breathtaking backdrops for your special day, from rolling meadows to ancient oak groves, creating the perfect canvas for your love story.

  • ✓ Historic barn with original exposed beams
  • ✓ Climate-controlled for year-round comfort
  • ✓ Multiple ceremony locations
  • ✓ Professional event coordination
Explore Services

Award-Winning Venue

Best Barn Wedding Venue 2023

Services (Content Sections) - Grid Layout [Barn Wedding Venueb]

What We OfferComplete Wedding ServicesEverything you need for your perfect day, thoughtfully curated

CONTENT SECTIONS barn-wedding-venueb.html 3047 bytes
large grid cards light-theme
HTML CODE 
<section class="section section-white" id="services">

What We Offer

Complete Wedding Services

Everything you need for your perfect day, thoughtfully curated and professionally executed

🏛️

Ceremony Spaces

Choose from our barn interior, garden pavilion, or meadow setting for your perfect ceremony backdrop

🎉

Reception Hall

Our grand barn features soaring ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and space for up to 250 guests

📸

Photo Opportunities

Stunning locations including vintage doors, wildflower fields, and our signature willow grove

🍽️

Catering Facilities

Full commercial kitchen and service areas for your chosen catering team

💐

Bridal Suite

Luxurious getting-ready space with natural light, comfort seating, and full amenities

🎵

Event Planning

Professional coordinators to guide you through every detail of your special day

About (Content Sections) - Grid Layout, Gradient, 1 Buttons [Barn Wedding Venue

About Our VenueWhere Rustic Charm Meets Modern EleganceNestled in the heart of California's wine cou

CONTENT SECTIONS barn-wedding-venuedddd.html 1504 bytes
gradient buttons grid medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="section section-gradient-1 divider-slant-down" id="about">
<div class="container">
<div class="grid-2">
<div class="content-block">
<div class="content-block-title">About Our Venue</div>
<h2>Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance</h2>
<p>
                        Nestled in the heart of California's wine country, Willow Creek Barn is a meticulously 
                        restored 1890s barn that seamlessly blends historic character with contemporary luxury.
                    </p>
<p>
                        Our 40-acre estate provides breathtaking backdrops for your special day, from rolling 
                        meadows to ancient oak groves, creating the perfect canvas for your love story.
                    </p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>
<span class="icon">✓</span>
<span>Historic barn with original exposed beams</span>
</li>
<li>
<span class="icon">✓</span>
<span>Climate-controlled for year-round comfort</span>
</li>
<li>
<span class="icon">✓</span>
<span>Multiple ceremony locations</span>
</li>
<li>
<span class="icon">✓</span>
<span>Professional event coordination</span>
</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn btn-primary mt-lg" href="#services">Explore Services</a>
</div>
<div class="image-wrapper">
<div style="height: 500px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #D4A574, #8B7355);"></div>
<div class="image-overlay">
<div class="image-overlay-content">
<h3>Award-Winning Venue</h3>
<p>Best Barn Wedding Venue 2023</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW
About Our Venue

Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance

Nestled in the heart of California's wine country, Willow Creek Barn is a meticulously restored 1890s barn that seamlessly blends historic character with contemporary luxury.

Our 40-acre estate provides breathtaking backdrops for your special day, from rolling meadows to ancient oak groves, creating the perfect canvas for your love story.

  • ✓ Historic barn with original exposed beams
  • ✓ Climate-controlled for year-round comfort
  • ✓ Multiple ceremony locations
  • ✓ Professional event coordination
Explore Services

Award-Winning Venue

Best Barn Wedding Venue 2023

<h2>Complete Wedding Services</h2>
<p style="max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto;">
                    Everything you need for your perfect day, thoughtfully curated and professionally executed
                </p>

<div class="grid-3">
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">🏛️</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Ceremony Spaces</h3>
<p class="card-description">

                    </p>
</div>
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">🎉</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Reception Hall</h3>
<p class="card-description">
                        Our grand barn features soaring ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and space for up to 250 guests
                    </p>
</div>
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">📸</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Photo Opportunities</h3>
<p class="card-description">

                    </p>
</div>
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">🍽️</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Catering Facilities</h3>
<p class="card-description">

                    </p>
</div>
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">💐</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Bridal Suite</h3>
<p class="card-description">
                        Luxurious getting-ready space with natural light, comfort seating, and full amenities
                    </p>
</div>
<div class="card">
<div class="card-icon">🎵</div>
<h3 class="card-title">Event Planning</h3>
<p class="card-description">
                        Professional coordinators to guide you through every detail of your special day
                    </p>

LIVE PREVIEW
What We Offer

Complete Wedding Services

Everything you need for your perfect day, thoughtfully curated and professionally executed

🏛️

Ceremony Spaces

Choose from our barn interior, garden pavilion, or meadow setting for your perfect ceremony backdrop

🎉

Reception Hall

Our grand barn features soaring ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and space for up to 250 guests

📸

Photo Opportunities

Stunning locations including vintage doors, wildflower fields, and our signature willow grove

🍽️

Catering Facilities

Full commercial kitchen and service areas for your chosen catering team

💐

Bridal Suite

Luxurious getting-ready space with natural light, comfort seating, and full amenities

🎵

Event Planning

Professional coordinators to guide you through every detail of your special day

Reviews

Love Stories from Our Couples

"Willow Creek Barn exceeded every expectation. The venue's natural beauty combined with the team's attention to detail made our wedding absolutely magical."

Sarah & Michael

June 2024 Wedding

Emily & James

September 2024 Wedding

HTML CODE 
<section class="blog-masonry">
<div class="container">
<div class="blog-header">
<div class="blog-header-text">
<h2>Stories from the Barn</h2>
<p>Wedding inspiration, planning tips, and real celebrations</p>
</div>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">View All Posts</a>
</div>
<div class="blog-grid">

Minnesota's Premier Venue

Where Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance

Create unforgettable memories in our beautifully restored barn, surrounded by 400 acres of Minnesota's natural splendor. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, your vision becomes reality here.

buttons large images light-theme
HTML CODE 
<section class="alternating-blocks divider-wave-up">
<div class="container">
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">01</div>
<h3>The Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>
<li>Capacity for up to 300 guests</li>
<li>State-of-the-art lighting system</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Explore The Barn</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Historic barn interior" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1510076857177-7470076d4098?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">100+ Years</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item reverse">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">02</div>
<h3>Vineyard Ceremonies</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Sunset ceremony perfection</li>
<li>Natural amphitheater setting</li>
<li>Rain backup in covered pavilion</li>
<li>Complimentary wine tasting for couples</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">View Ceremony Sites</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Vineyard ceremony site" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1474112704314-8162b7749a90?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">5 Locations</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="block-item">
<div class="block-content">
<div class="number">03</div>
<h3>Enchanted Forest</h3>
<p>Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Professional trail lighting available</li>
<li>Hidden clearings for portraits</li>
<li>Seasonal wildflower meadows</li>
<li>Private couple's photography hour</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Discover The Grounds</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Forest wedding photos" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519741497674-611481863552?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">400 Acres</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Celebrate Every Moment

From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we're here for all of life's milestones

Celebrations

Explore Our Spaces

Every corner tells a story, every space creates memories

The Historic Barn

Our crown jewel, this beautifully restored barn features soaring ceilings, original timber beams, and modern amenities seamlessly integrated into its historic charm.

Capacity

Up to 300 guests

Features

Built-in bar & dance floor

Lighting

Edison bulbs & chandeliers

Climate

Heated & air conditioned

LIVE PREVIEW

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

<div class="number">03</div>
<h3>Enchanted Forest</h3>
<p>Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Professional trail lighting available</li>
<li>Hidden clearings for portraits</li>
<li>Seasonal wildflower meadows</li>
<li>Private couple's photography hour</li>
</ul>
<a class="btn-outline" href="#">Discover The Grounds</a>
</div>
<div class="block-image">
<img alt="Forest wedding photos" src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519741497674-611481863552?w=800"/>
<span class="image-badge">400 Acres</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations

  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

<section class="features" id="features">
<h2>Exceptional <span class="accent-text">Amenities</span></h2>
<div class="features-grid">
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🏛️</div>
<h3>Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Our beautifully restored 1890s barn accommodates up to 250 guests with original timber beams and modern amenities.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🍇</div>
<h3>Vineyard Views</h3>
<p>Exchange vows surrounded by rolling vineyards and enjoy locally produced wines from our own harvest.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🌅</div>
<h3>Outdoor Ceremony</h3>
<p>Multiple outdoor ceremony locations including our garden pavilion and riverside grove.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">👰</div>
<h3>Bridal Suite</h3>
<p>Spacious bridal suite with private entrance, full amenities, and stunning views for preparation.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">🍽️</div>
<h3>Catering Excellence</h3>
<p>Full-service kitchen and partnerships with the region's finest caterers and culinary artists.</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-card">
<div class="feature-icon">📸</div>
<h3>Photo Opportunities</h3>
<p>Countless scenic backdrops including vintage bridges, wildflower meadows, and golden hour vineyard rows.</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>

Exceptional Amenities

🏛️

Historic Barn

Our beautifully restored 1890s barn accommodates up to 250 guests with original timber beams and modern amenities.

🍇

Vineyard Views

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling vineyards and enjoy locally produced wines from our own harvest.

🌅

Outdoor Ceremony

Multiple outdoor ceremony locations including our garden pavilion and riverside grove.

👰

Bridal Suite

Spacious bridal suite with private entrance, full amenities, and stunning views for preparation.

🍽️

Catering Excellence

Full-service kitchen and partnerships with the region's finest caterers and culinary artists.

📸

Photo Opportunities

Countless scenic backdrops including vintage bridges, wildflower meadows, and golden hour vineyard rows.

About (Content Sections) - Grid Layout [Rum River Weasdfdsfd]

YourPerfect DayAwaitsNestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restore

CONTENT SECTIONS rum-river-weasdfdsfdding-venue.html 703 bytes
grid medium
HTML CODE 
<section class="about" id="about">
<div class="section-container">
<div class="about-grid">
<div class="about-content">
<h2>Your <span class="accent-text">Perfect Day</span><br/>Awaits</h2>
<p>Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.</p>
<p>With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.</p>
<p>Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.</p>
</div>
<div class="about-image">
<div class="image-placeholder"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Your Perfect Day
Awaits

Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.

With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.

Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.

Your Perfect Day
Awaits

Nestled along the scenic Rum River, our historic barn has been lovingly restored to create the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.

With sprawling vineyards, century-old oak trees, and breathtaking sunset views, Rum River Barn & Vineyard offers an enchanting backdrop for your special day.

Every wedding here tells a unique story, and we're honored to be part of yours.

<div class="number">01</div>
<h3>The Historic Barn</h3>
<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>
<ul class="feature-list">
<li>Climate-controlled comfort year-round</li>
<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>

LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Every corner tells a story, every space creates memories

The Historic Barn

Our crown jewel, this beautifully restored barn features soaring ceilings, original timber beams, and modern amenities seamlessly integrated into its historic charm.

Capacity

Up to 300 guests

Features

Built-in bar & dance floor

Lighting

Edison bulbs & chandeliers

Climate

Heated & air conditioned

                            <span>/ up to 300 guests</span>

</div>
<div class="package-body">
<ul class="package-features">
<li>Full weekend rental</li>
<li>All venue spaces included</li>
<li>Luxury décor collection</li>
<li>Golf cart transportation</li>
<li>Fire pit & s'mores bar</li>
<li>Morning-after brunch setup</li>
</ul>
<button class="package-btn">Ultimate Experience</button>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
LIVE PREVIEW

Investment in Memories

Wedding Packages

Intimate

$3,500 / up to 75 guests
  • 6-hour venue rental
  • Ceremony & reception spaces
  • Tables, chairs & linens
  • Bridal suite access
  • Setup & breakdown assistance

Classic

$5,500 / up to 150 guests
  • 10-hour venue rental
  • Full property access
  • Premium décor package
  • Both suites included
  • Day-before setup time
  • Complimentary rehearsal

Grand

$8,500 / up to 300 guests
  • Full weekend rental
  • All venue spaces included
  • Luxury décor collection
  • Golf cart transportation
  • Fire pit & s'mores bar
  • Morning-after brunch setup

<li>Original exposed beam architecture</li>
<li>Capacity for up to 300 guests</li>

01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests

02

  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples

  • Seasonal wildflower meadows

<p>Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.</p>

LIVE PREVIEW
01

The Historic Barn

Step into a piece of Minnesota history. Our meticulously restored barn combines century-old craftsmanship with modern amenities, creating the perfect backdrop for your celebration.

  • Climate-controlled comfort year-round
  • Original exposed beam architecture
  • Capacity for up to 300 guests
  • State-of-the-art lighting system
Explore The Barn
100+ Years
02

Vineyard Ceremonies

Exchange vows surrounded by rolling hills and grape vines. Our vineyard offers multiple ceremony sites, each with its own unique charm and breathtaking views.

  • Sunset ceremony perfection
  • Natural amphitheater setting
  • Rain backup in covered pavilion
  • Complimentary wine tasting for couples
View Ceremony Sites
5 Locations
03

Enchanted Forest

Wander through our mile-long paths beneath ancient oaks and whispering pines. The forest provides endless opportunities for stunning photography and intimate moments.

  • Professional trail lighting available
  • Hidden clearings for portraits
  • Seasonal wildflower meadows
  • Private couple's photography hour
Discover The Grounds
400 Acres

Real Weddings at Rum River

</div>
